description: Test 'use HTML::Widget' failed due to 'Use of freed value in iteration' in Module::Pluggable::Fast line 74, causing compilation abortion during test execution.
Build prerequisites Test::Fatal and Test::Refcount are missing, causing test harness failures and non-zero exits during test execution.
Implicit function declarations for 'tap', 'mac_disc', and 'send_eth_packet' in XS code cause compilation errors, leading to build failure.
DTMF audio generator/extractor tests failed for codecs pcmu and pcma due to unexpected values in test output structures.
Undefined subroutine reference in YAML::PP::Representer during test execution causes fatal errors and exits with status 255.
Implicit declaration of function 'rpmvercmp' in XS code leads to compilation failure during RPM build process.
Invalid terms and trailing characters during libpng header parsing in MakeDepend.pm cause build script failures.
Undefined subroutine reference in YAML::PP::Representer during test execution causes YAML dump failures and test errors.
Non-zero exit statuses and TAP output parsing errors in test files cause test suite failures and build abortion.
